Allergy Information

Important information about allergens and our commitment to food safety.

Common Allergens

We take food allergies seriously. Please be aware of these common ingredients in our baked goods.

Gluten

Found in wheat, barley, rye, and some oat products.

Eggs

Common in cakes, pastries, and some bread products.

Dairy

Including milk, butter, cream, and cheese products.

Tree Nuts

Including almonds, walnuts, pecans, and hazelnuts.

Our Safety Measures

We follow strict protocols to prevent cross-contamination and ensure food safety for all our members.

Clean Equipment

All equipment is thoroughly cleaned between uses to prevent cross-contamination.

Labeled Products

All baked goods are clearly labeled with ingredient information.

Separate Storage

Allergen-free products are stored separately to maintain safety.

Alternative Options

Gluten-Free Options

We offer various gluten-free alternatives for our baked goods.

Dairy-Free Options

Multiple dairy-free substitutes available for most recipes.

Nut-Free Options

Safe alternatives for those with nut allergies.

Allergy Declaration Form

Please fill out this form to inform us about any allergies or dietary restrictions. This helps us ensure your safety during club events.
